author: newsr.in
title: Wankhede diaries: When fans endured a route shock, courtesy MS Dhoni
text: Ever since Sachin Tendulkar retired from cricket in 2013, Mahendra Singh Dhoni and Virat Kohli have become the biggest crowd pullers for Mumbaikars at the Wankhede Stadium. However, the 100-odd fans who came to watch their demigods practice in the searing heat on Saturday afternoon, were left high and dry after India's limited ... Â»
